title: 1/8/18-Mark Levin Audio Rewind
description:
On Monday’s Mark Levin show, Oprah’s speech at the Golden Globes was an outrageous diversion and a humiliating embarrassment. She didn't call out anyone by name, she didn't point a finger at the audience and admonish the actors, nothing about the cultu...
